content:
**gauge ** 12 sts = 7 8 row = 5 in pat with larger hook yarn is held double throughout body **size **
to fit bust 30-32 34-36 38-40 42-44
finished bust 36 41 45 1/2 50
**yarn requirments **
moda dea cheri 1 76oz/81yd 5 6 7 8 balls
moda dea curious 1 76oz/78yd 3 4 5 5 balls **other items needed **
stitch markers yarn needle one 1 1/4 button sewing needle and thread
